abstract: Jason Zinoman On Comedy column praises stand-up comedian Sebastian Maniscalco, saying that he excels when it comes to the physical representation of his jokes; examine history of comedic skill known as the 'act-out'.
lead_paragraph: What distinguishes acts like Sebastian Maniscalco’s is a full-bodied commitment to the act-out: stand-up jargon describing a shift from narrating a joke to acting it.
snippet: What distinguishes acts like Sebastian Maniscalco’s is a full-bodied commitment to the act-out: stand-up jargon describing a shift from narrating a joke to acting it.

headline.main: Not Just Telling a Joke, but Showing It, Too
headline.seo: Comedians Like Sebastian Maniscalco Act Out Their Humor
headline.print_headline: Not Just Telling a Joke, but Showing It, Too
